subject: Simsonn Products Not Working
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered some pedals and a sequential shifter from you guys and
installed the product manager from your website. Up until yesterday they
both worked fine with aero issues, but now they will not function. The
product manager pics them up but they show no input when used. I cannot
calibrate the pedals and I do not see any input up or down on the
sequential shifter. I am at a loss of what to do, I have tried moving usb
ports around, removing cords providing power from my metal chassis in order
to ground it, uninstalling and updating the product manager, and wiping and
reinstalling drivers. I am not sure what my next step would be and I would
really appreciate any assistance you can provide to me. Thank you for your
time.

Weston Fredrickson

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并至工单 4402。
